mapper.select: insert into MEMBERBOARD (id, pw, name, birthDate, gender, mobile, address, add2, regdate, idupdate, gradeno, email) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, TO_DATE(#{birthDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{gender}, #{mobile}, #{address}, #{add2}, sysdate, sysdate, 1, #{email})
select id, name, birthDate, mobile, address, add2, email from memberboard where id = #{id}
